mapper.select: select level,articleno, parentno, title, content, id, writedate, imageFileName, id from t_board start with parentNO=0 CONNECT by prior articleno = parentno order siblings by articleno desc

select * from(select rownum as rownum2, lvl, articleno, parentno, title, content, id, writedate from ( select level as lvl,articleno, parentno, lpad(' ', 2*(level-1))||title as title, content, id, writedate from t_board start with parentNO=0 CONNECT by prior articleno = parentno order siblings by articleno desc)) where rownum2 between(?-1)*100+(?-1)*10+1 and (?-1)*100+?*10
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in ( SELECT articleNO FROM t_board START WITH articleNO = #{articleNO} CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO )
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_board(articleNO, title, content, imageFileName, id) VALUES(#{articleNO},#{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
